snippet: Articles based on companies’ quarterly reports are quite formulaic, and The Associated Press says that automating the process will free up its staff.
abstract: Associated Press announces that it will use computer automation to write articles about quarterly earnings of companies, one of most formulaic tasks for business reporters; move will free up staff and no journalism jobs will be lost.
lead_paragraph: Articles based on companies’ quarterly reports are quite formulaic, and The Associated Press says that automating the process will free up its staff.

headline.main: The A.P. Plans to Automate Quarterly Earnings Articles
headline.print_headline: The A.P. Plans to Automate Some Writing
